features.headline: Three Pillars. One Truth.
features.subheadline: We avoid the "God Object" trap of legacy systems. Mirathi strictly separates facts (Family) from money (Estate) and procedure (Succession).

family.title: Family Service
family.description: The Source of Kinship Truth. We map S.40 Houses and biological relationships to establish legal beneficiaries.
family.detail_description: Mirathi separates "Family" from "Finance". We create a digital twin of your family tree that strictly adheres to the Children Act and Marriage Act, ensuring no rightful beneficiary is excluded.
family.feature_4: Separates Biological ties from Asset claims

estate.title: Estate Service
estate.description: The Economic Truth Engine. A deterministic inventory of Assets vs. Debts to ensure solvency before distribution.
estate.detail_description: An estate cannot be distributed if it is insolvent. Our "Active Intelligence" calculates Net Estate Value in real-time, enforcing S.45 priority (Funeral > Secured Debts > Unsecured Debts).
estate.feature_4: Blocks distribution if debts exceed assets

succession.title: Succession Service
succession.description: The Digital Lawyer. Automates compliance with Cap 160, generating court-ready forms (P&A 80, P&A 5).
succession.detail_description: The system acts as a "Digital Copilot," preventing you from generating forms until the Readiness Score reaches 80%. It handles the complexity of Intestate vs. Testate workflows automatically.

how_it_works.headline: See the System Respond
how_it_works.subheadline: When you upload a death certificate, watch Mirathi's microservices orchestrate your succession journey in real-time.

step_1.title: The "Death Event"
step_1.description: You upload a Death Certificate. The system freezes the Estate Service to protect assets and triggers the Succession Service.

step_2.title: Document Verification
step_2.description: Upload assets (Title Deeds). Our OCR extracts data, and Verifiers approve the "Claim Check" to validate the asset.

step_3.title: Graph Consensus
step_3.description: The Family Service prompts all beneficiaries to sign digital consents, ensuring the family graph is agreed upon.

step_4.title: Readiness Audit
step_4.description: The Intelligence Engine runs a compliance check. If the score is >80%, it unlocks the filing generation.

step_5.title: Court Filing
step_5.description: Download the complete, legally compliant PDF bundle ready for the High Court registry.
